casebody.data:
De Ann MAURICE
v.
CHESTER HOUSING ASSOCIATES LIMITED PARTNERSHIP et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 1, 2019

Michael P. Carey, New London, in support of the petition.

The petition of the plaintiff in error for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 21, 204 A.3d 71 (2019), is denied.
